channel.title: Can we address the Mass Leavers on Day 1 who try to get in the same game as streamers
channel.description:
Just played a game where 9 people left when they were still alive because they were not in the same game as their favorite streamer (at least that's what I am assuming when mass leavers do this)
I and a few others stayed (much respect to you guys) just for the principle of not leaving games while alive since its against the rules but this madness needs to stop.
I reported the leavers but doubt they will care and just keep doing it. Mass leavers really makes the games no fun.
[img]https://i.imgur.com/42LAABr.png[/img]
